LanguageData.CFLL.maxefficency.label: Maximum lost part efficency: {0}%
LanguageData.CFLL.maxefficency.description: A missing bodypart (and its inherited parts) will have a maximum of this amount of efficency instead of the default 0
LanguageData.CFLL.recoverytime.label: Recovery time: {0} days
LanguageData.CFLL.recoverytime.description: The efficency will take this amount of days to reach the maximum defined above
LanguageData.CFLL.version.label: Installed mod-version: {0}
